name: QS Discover for Masters and MBA in Boston
content: Master's and MBA candidates register at this link: https://bit.ly/4azQ3Ax Learn more about graduate school admissions, financing options, and attend career and personal branding panels. Get a step ahead of your competition and meet admissions representatives face-to-face. You'll also become eligible for exclusive scholarships and a free professional headshot, just for attending! The event is free, but spots are limited, so make sure to register now. Save your place by registering today! Time: 5:00 PM - 8:30 PM Venue details: Hyatt Regency Boston, 1 Avenue de Lafayette, Boston, Massachusetts, 02111, United States Price: Free: USD 0.00
